subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
PGA Championship
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: We've all been there: stranded in the bunker with no hope of getting out of the sand less than three shots. But a different approach may be all it takes to escape the desert for the green.
snippet: We've all been there: stranded in the bunker with no hope of getting out of the sand less than three shots. But a different approach may be all it takes to escape the desert for the green.
